resources.string: Turn on tracking to use this app.
Your enterprise certificate will expire in %1$d days.
Your enterprise certificate will expire in 1 day.
Your enterprise certificate will expire today.
Your enterprise certificate will expire in less than 2 weeks.
Press the button to begin controller pairing.
Please use a controller to continue setting up a roomscale Guardian boundary.
Please use a controller to continue setting up a Passthrough Keyboard area.
This app requires the latest Oculus software version. Please leave your headset on, connected to Wi-Fi and plugged into a power source. Your headset will restart when the update is complete.
These are the current builds of apps that are on your headset. You can view the latest builds in oculus browser by selecting an app.
Please reboot your headset for the update to install.
Are you sure you want to reset all sideloaded updates?
Your headset will download the update.

This experience requires you to be in a stationary position. Please clear the space around you before beginning and remain seated in the same place while in this experience. Listen to and follow any instructions from your administrator.
This app must be purchased separately to be used by multiple devices at the same time. To continue, quit this app on any other devices.
Multiple Devices Can\'t Access This App at the Same Time

Place the controller ring on top of your desk, then press the trigger button to continue.

You can skip this step if the desk height already looks accurate.
Choose what kind of boundary you want to create.

Look down at the floor and hold your hand out in front of you. Pinch and hold your thumb and index finger together to draw along the boundary of your play area.

We recommend a play area size of 6.5ft x 6.5ft or greater for roomscale experiences.

Look down at the floor and hold your hand out in front of you. Pinch and hold your thumb and index finger together to draw along the boundary of your play area.

We recommend a play area size of 2m x 2m or greater for roomscale experiences.

Point your controller at the floor, then press and hold the trigger to draw along the boundary of your cleared play area.

We recommend a play area size of 6.5ft x 6.5ft or greater for roomscale experiences.

Point your controller at the floor, then press and hold the trigger to draw along the boundary of your cleared play area.

We recommend a play area size of 2m x 2m or greater for roomscale experiences.
Make sure the surface lines up with your couch seat.
Please confirm that you are entering the couch space.
Make sure the surface lines up with your real desk.
Make sure the surface lines up with your real desk.
Press Confirm to accept the keyboard area or Redraw to define a new one.
Please edit the surface and confirm it
Check to make sure that the virtual whiteboard plane matches up to your real whiteboard.
Please confirm that you are entering the whiteboard space.

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your couch seat, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the couch to the other, then release the trigger button when you’re finished.

The minimum surface width is 12in.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your couch seat, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the couch to the other, then release the trigger button when you’re finished.

The minimum surface width is 30cm.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the front edge of your couch seat, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the couch to the other, then open both fingers when you’re finished.

The minimum surface width is 12in.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the front edge of your couch seat, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the couch to the other, then open both fingers when you’re finished.

The minimum surface width is 30cm.

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 20in.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 50cm.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 20in.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 50cm.

To use Workrooms you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 20in.

Press B or Y to cancel.

To use Workrooms you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 50cm.

Press B or Y to cancel.

To use Workrooms you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 20in.

To use Workrooms you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers when you\'re finished.

The minimum surface width is 50cm.
Press and hold the trigger to draw a line across the edge of the surface.
Pinch and hold your thumb and index finger together to draw a line across the edge of the surface.
Draw a line across the front of the whiteboard. \10 Press the B or Y button to cancel.
Draw a line across the front of the whiteboard.
You already have a couch in this area. How would you like to modify it?
You already have a desk in this area. How would you like to modify it?
It looks like you already have a Passthrough Keyboard area defined, do you want to modify it?
It looks like you already have a whiteboard in the area, do you want to modify it?
Hand tracking not working? Use a controller to continue.
Look around to check that this boundary is correctly positioned and clear of any obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.
Look around to check that your boundaries and surfaces are correctly positioned and clear of any obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.
Please wait while Insight tries to find an existing Guardian System for your play area.
Please create a new Guardian boundary for your play area.
You\'ve left your Guardian boundary. Please return or create a new boundary.
You\'ve left your Guardian boundary. Please remove your headset and return to your play area, or create a new boundary.
You\'ve moved too far. Remove your headset and return to your original position, or select Continue if you are in a safe space to keep using your headset.
Your play area meets the recommended size. You can use any roomscale, standing or seated experience in this space.
Continuing without making any changes may increase your risk of injury or damage.

Redraw your boundary, or lift your headset and remove objects from your play area. Some objects may not be detected.

Continuing with objects inside or near your boundary may increase your risk of injury or damage. If you get too close to the edge of your play area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in VR to alert you.
Check for Objects in Play Area
You\'ve spent too long outside of a known play area. Please remove your headset or return to your play area.
You\'ve spent too long in Guardian setup. Please finish creating a boundary or remove your headset. Visit support.oculus.com for more info.
You need to quit this app to continue. If you quit now, you may lose any unsaved progress.

Look around to check that this boundary is correctly positioned and clear of any obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

This can be used for all sitting or standing experiences. If you get too close to the edge of your play area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.

Redraw your boundary, or lift your headset and remove objects from your play area. Some objects may not be detected.

Continuing with objects inside or near your boundary may increase your risk of injury or damage. If you get too close to the edge of your play area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.
Your play area meets the recommended size of 6.5ft x 6.5ft or greater. You can use any roomscale, standing or seated experience in this space.
Your play area meets the recommended size of 2m x 2m or greater. You can use any roomscale, standing or seated experience in this space.

Look around to check that this boundary is correctly positioned and clear of any obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

This can be used for all sitting or standing experiences. If you get too close to the edge of your play area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.
Choose one MR surface to be created

Look down at the virtual grid. If it appears to be at floor level, select Confirm.

If not, select Reset. Move the grid down by gently touching the floor with your controller before confirming.

Look down at the virtual grid. If it appears to be at floor level, select Confirm.

If not, select Reset. Move the grid down by gently touching the floor with your hand before confirming.
Your play area is less than the minimum required size of 3ft x 3ft. You can clear more space and redraw your play area or continue with a boundary for sitting or standing experiences only.
Your play area is less than the minimum required size of 1m x 1m. You can clear more space and redraw your play area or continue with a boundary for sitting or standing experiences only.
Your play area is less than the recommended size of 6.5ft x 6.5ft. You can clear more space and redraw your play area or continue with what you have.
Your play area is less than the recommended size of 2m x 2m. You can clear more space and redraw your play area or continue with what you have.

Look around to check that this boundary is clear of obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

This stationary Guardian is for sitting or standing experiences only. If you get too close to the edge of your play area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.

Look around to check that this boundary is clear of obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

This stationary Guardian is for sitting or standing experiences only. When your headset gets close to the edge of your play area, Passthrough will fade in and you\'ll see a real-time view of your physical environment.
To use this feature, please pick up your controllers and select Continue.
Confirm Couch as your active play area, or go back to your previous play area.
Confirm Desk as your active play area, or go back to your previous play area.
Confirm Desk as your active play area, or go back to your previous play area. If you switch to Desk now, the app will close and you may lose any unsaved progress.
Quit App and Switch to Desk
Confirm Roomscale as your active play area, or go back to your previous play area.
Confirm Stationary as your active play area, or go back to your previous play area.

Your device can\'t track the movement of your headset because the surfaces in your room are too plain.

Try to restore tracking by completely removing your headset and moving to an area with more contrast on surrounding surfaces.

Your play area lacks contrast, color or pattern needed for headset tracking. Please change your play area to restore tracking.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Your play area lacks contrast, color or pattern needed for headset tracking. Please change your play area to restore tracking or quit this app to continue with tracking off.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Something went wrong and your device can\'t track the movement of your headset.

Try to restore tracking by completely removing your headset and waiting a few seconds before putting it back on.

Something went wrong and your device can\'t track its movement or position in your play area.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Something went wrong and your device can\'t track its movement or position in your play area. Please quit this app to continue with tracking off.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Your device can\'t track the movement of your headset because there\'s too much light in the room.

Try to restore tracking by completely removing your headset and adjusting your room\'s light.

It\'s too bright in your play area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

It\'s too bright in your play area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking or quit this app to continue with tracking off.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Your device can\'t track the movement of your headset because there\'s not enough light in the room.

Try to restore tracking by completely removing your headset and adjusting your room\'s light.

It\'s too dark in your play area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

It\'s too dark in your play area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking or quit this app to continue with tracking off.

When tracking is off, Guardian is disabled and you won\'t be alerted to your play area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.
Guardian helps you stay within your play area by creating a boundary around you in VR. This virtual boundary is only visible if you\'re near or touching it.
Guardian helps you stay within your play area by creating a boundary around you in VR. This virtual boundary is only visible if you\'re near or touching it.
We have sent a notification to the Oculus app on your smartphone.
Try an easier way to type using your smartphone keyboard.
%1$s uses an online service that no longer works with this device. Some features may not behave as intended.
%1$s requires online services that do not work with this device.
%1$s has available updates. Do you wish to update now?
This app can\'t be used with Desk. To open this app, move to a different playspace and open the app again.
This app doesn’t comply with one or more of our policies. You can still use this app, but some functionality may be disabled until the app is in compliance. Learn More
Turn on tracking to use this app.
You are launching an app which uses your Oculus Avatar, but it looks like you haven\'t customized an avatar yet. Personalizing your Avatar will help people recognize you in the app.
The app you\'re trying to open needs to reserve your microphone. You\'ll remain in this party, but you won’t be able to hear or talk to your friends until you exit this app.
Pinch with your thumb and index finger to select. Pinch and hold to scroll.
Device storage is critically low. You have less than 500MB remaining.
Device storage is getting low. You have less than 2GB remaining.
Rotate your head to reorient the panels in front of you and select confirm to set their position.

When full Passthrough is enabled, you won\'t need to use a Guardian boundary unless you enter an immersive experience.

Use the Passthrough slider in quick settings to adjust your home environment from full VR to full Passthrough anytime.

For your safety, stay close to your original seated or standing position while Guardian is not active. Keep your play area clear to prevent injury and follow all instructions and warnings provided on-screen and with the headset.
Double tap the left or right side of your headset to turn on passthrough at any time. Double tap again, to exit passthrough and get back into VR.
You need to quit %s to continue. If you quit now, you may lose any unsaved progress.
Press and hold the Oculus button and then press a trigger. Your photos will appear in your camera roll.
Hand tracking on. Pinch with your thumb and index finger to select an option.
Adjust your room lighting to restore tracking, or switch to controllers.
Double tap the left or right side of your headset to turn off passthrough
You can change your virtual home environment and choose from a variety of options anytime in Settings.
Your Virtual Home Environment was Updated
You\'re currently using an app that requires tracking. Turning off tracking will quit this app.
Guardian is disabled when tracking is off. Turn tracking on to set a Guardian boundary.

Our Platform Abuse Policy prohibits piracy, illicit modding, cheating and other unauthorized usage.

If this unofficial version of %1$s is not for development purposes, please restore the app to the Oculus Store version now.
